title: Significant strides made in renewable energy sector: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi
description: India has significantly advanced in renewable energy, achieving a 175% growth in capacity since 2014. The renewable energy capacity now exceeds 208 GW. Solar energy capacity has increased 33 times in the last 10 years. India is also leading global sustainability initiatives with the lowest per capita emissions among G20 nations and meeting climate targets ahead of schedule.
